Token.Abstract: Implementing the PTPusherDelegate protocol lets you react to important events in the Pusher client's lifetime, such as connection and disconnection, channel subscription and errors.
Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance is about to connect to the Pusher service.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that is connecting.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

ReturnValue.Abstract: NO to abort the connection attempt.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has connected to the Pusher service successfully.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has disconnected from the Pusher service.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: If the connection disconnected abnormally, error will be non-nil.

Parameter.Name: willAttemptReconnect
Parameter.Abstract: YES if the client will try and reconnect automatically.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance failed to connect to the Pusher service.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The connection error.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance will attempt to automatically reconnect.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

ReturnValue.Abstract: NO if you do not want the client to attempt an automatic reconnection.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate of the request that will be used to authorize access to a channel.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that is requesting authorization

Parameter.Name: channel
Parameter.Abstract: The channel that requires authorizing

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: A mutable URL request that will be POSTed to the configured authorizationURL

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has subscribed to the specified channel.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: channel
Parameter.Abstract: The channel that was subscribed to.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has unsubscribed from the specified channel.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: channel
Parameter.Abstract: The channel that was unsubscribed from.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance failed to subscribe to the specified channel.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: channel
Parameter.Abstract: The channel that was subscribed to.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error returned when attempting to subscribe.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that an error event has been received.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that received the event.

Parameter.Name: errorEvent
Parameter.Abstract: The error event.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has disconnected from the Pusher service. (Deprecated: Use pusher:connection:didDisconnectWithError:willAttemptReconnect:)

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has disconnected from the Pusher service. (Deprecated: Use pusher:connection:didDisconnectWithError:willAttemptReconnect:)

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: If the connection disconnected abnormally, error will be non-nil.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate of the request that will be used to authorize access to a channel.
